title: Juice 'N Beans Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Western, Juice bar
description: Offering a daily changing menu that includes international food types. Specialty coffees & teas, 100% pure crushed fruit shakes, protein shakes, vegetarian soups, salads, sandwiches, samosas, spring rolls, ice cream, pastries, and baked goods. Cozy and modern cafe set up. Located in the heart of downtown Hamilton, overlooking the harbor from a short distance. Confirmed open Oct 2011.
